name: parsed-model
description: parses a 3D model into geometries and materials so you can add them to your scene using react-three or react-three-renderer

scripts.build: browserify src/parsed_model.js -t [ babelify --presets [es2015 react] --plugins [transform-class-properties] ] --debug | exorcist lib/index.js.map | uglifyjs -c > lib/index.js
